attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to know why Heinz the company can have a picture of the the houses of Parliament on a label of a product that has been produced for decades in the UK, but feel the need to move production to another country? This is even though the product is fundementally British.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
